entries.title: Cramer’s week ahead: Don’t let the Fed’s meeting obscure investing opportunities
entries.description: Two key economic events take place next week, including the release of the November consumer price index report and the Federal Reserve’s December meeting.

entries.title: Majority of Americans don't want Biden or Trump to run again in 2024, CNBC survey shows
entries.description: The survey found 61% of the public think Trump should not seek the presidency, compared with 30% who believe he should.

entries.title: Arizona Sen. Kyrsten Sinema leaves Democratic Party to become independent
entries.description: Sinema said in a tweet she was declaring her "independence from the broken partisan system in Washington and formally registering as an Arizona Independent."

entries.title: Americans are flocking to wildfire country
entries.description: From 2010 to 2020, Americans migrated to the Pacific Northwest, Southwest, Texas, Florida, and parts of the Southeast. Many of these places are prone to fire.

entries.title: A nutritionist shares the 'underrated' longevity food she eats every day to boost her immune system
entries.description: Want to live to 100? Research says eating more legumes could help you live a longer life. Nutritionist Samantha Heller shares the benefits of this unexpectedly versatile food.

entries.title: Taylor Swift signs on to direct a movie for Disney as she campaigns for short film Oscar
entries.description: Taylor Swift has written an original script that will be produced by Disney's Searchlight Pictures.

entries.title: Grocery delivery firm Getir acquires embattled rival Gorillas as industry consolidates
entries.description: The long-rumored takeover reportedly values Gorillas at $1.2 billion, down 15% from its last valuation.

entries.title: UK's new finance reforms part of a 20-year plan to be 'world's next Silicon Valley,' minister says
entries.description: The reforms have been touted as a post-Brexit overhaul of EU laws that "choke off growth."

entries.title: FTC sues to block Microsoft's acquisition of Activision Blizzard
entries.description: This isn't Microsoft's first run-in with U.S. regulators. Microsoft said it did believe in giving peace a chance. Now it looks forward to a court appearance.

entries.title: European Central Bank warns that an EU gas price cap risks financial stability
entries.description: The European Central Bank warned that an EU-wide cap on natural gas prices could jeopardize financial stability in the region.

entries.title: Huawei licenses 5G patents to rival as U.S. sanctions force the Chinese giant to seek new revenue
entries.description: Huawei historically has not monetized its huge chest of 5G patents but it is looking to find new revenue streams after U.S. sanctions crushed its mobile business.

entries.title: Brits told to rethink Christmas plans with strikes set to hit flights and train travel
entries.description: The government has urged the public to rethink their travel plans if they are on an affected service.

entries.title: UK announces major overhaul of its financial sector in attempt to spur growth
entries.description: The U.K. government is seeking to overhaul EU laws that "choke off growth."

entries.title: TSMC bucks broader chip slump with 50% revenue surge, helped by Apple iPhone orders
entries.description: The world's largest contract chipmaker reported the November surge thanks in part to orders of semiconductors for high-end smartphones such as Apple's iPhone.

entries.title: Russia's Ukraine onslaught shows zero signs of a winter lull as conflict rages
entries.description: Russia and Ukraine are sending out smoke signals that there is no time — and no desire — for a cessation of hostilities.

entries.title: Southeast Asia's 5G outlook remains 'bleak' in short term despite tech giant partnership, report says
entries.description: A report by Fitch Solutions says that a 5G partnership between two conglomerates could help accelerate 5G in Southeast Asia but the outlook remains "bleak."

entries.title: China's yuan could get a boost as Covid measures ease, says BK Asset Management
entries.description: The onshore and offshore Chinese yuan is expected to strengthen even further than current levels, according to BK Asset Management.

entries.title: What to expect next as China relaxes Covid controls
entries.description: As mainland China relaxes many of its stringent Covid controls, analysts point out the country is far from a quick return to a pre-pandemic situation.

entries.title: SEC issues new guidance requiring companies to disclose cryptocurrency risks
entries.description: Under the new SEC guidance, companies will have to include crypto asset holdings as well as their risk exposure to the FTX bankruptcy in their public filings.

entries.title: Apple supplier Foxconn reportedly helped persuade China to loosen Covid rules
entries.description: Foxconn founder Terry Gou reportedly said China's zero-Covid policy threatened its position in global supply chains.
